text:
Lambda Investments ( https://lambdainvestments.com ) - front-end engineer. Local/remote, Lviv, Ukraine. Have to start locally.

We specialize in developing front-ends for big clients and optimizing them. Working with 2 multi-billion dollar clients at the moment.

Salary $15-25k depending on experience.

* WordPress * PHP * JavaScript * Apache/Nginx * GIT * SASS * Memcache

We're working on Wordpress stuff like https://unhype.com

apply at: jobs@lambdainvestments.com
